DOC.brief_summary: The study explore vivo lens dehydration rate across 12hr wear period study lens .
DOC.brief_title: Dehydration Stenfilcon A Contact Lenses Versus Delefilcon A Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: The study explore vivo lens dehydration rate across 12hr wear period study lens . The primary outcome variable study loss lens weight day , indicate amount dehydration occur .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign information consent letter ; 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; 4 . Is current wearer soft contact lenses worn ( brand ) 3 month . 5 . Is able wear lens least 12 hour day . 1 . Is participate concurrent clinical study ; 2 . Has know active* ocular disease and/or infection ; 3 . Has systemic condition opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; 4 . Is use systemic topical medication opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; 5 . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; 6 . Has undergone refractive error surgery ; *For purpose study , active ocular disease define infection inflammation require therapeutic treatment . Mild ( i.e . consider clinically relevant ) lid abnormality ( blepharitis , meibomian gland dysfunction , papilla ) , corneal conjunctival stain dry eye consider active ocular disease . Neovascularization corneal scar result previous hypoxia , infection inflammation therefore active .
